item.title: zitadel/oidc
item.description: Easy to use OpenID Connect client and server library written for Go and certified by the OpenID Foundation

item.title: teamhanko/hanko
item.description: Privacy-first Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) for modern apps. Open source alternative to Auth0, Cognito, Clerk, Descope, Stytch.
